fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player to survey each night. If they visited someone last night, you will learn the Sheriff result of whoever they visited. This ability will fail if the target visited no one or visited more than one person. Failing does not refund a use. (3 uses)
- Hold a grand inspection during the night. Next morning, you will learn how many alive players are evil. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the end of Night 2 and Night 4, you will learn a random non-unique alive Town role. You can't learn about your own role, guaranteed roles, or the same role twice.
